POSITION

[acss-position="dock"]

dock can attach elements to their parent container with a position.

* PARENT SHOULD BE [acss-dock]

dock right=30 bottom=20

[acss-position="fixed"]

Scroll window to feel fixed element on the top right corner.

FIXED

[acss-position="offset"]

Offset element can offset itself position.

ELEMENT
offset left=10 top=10
ELEMENT

[acss-position="center"]

acss position box support many kinds of positioning.

dock top left
dock top center-x
dock top right
dock left center-y
dock center
dock right center-y
dock bottom left
dock bottom center-x
dock bottom right
